global.continue?: Are you sure you want to continue?
global.balanceErrorMessage: You do not have enough IOTA to complete this transfer.
global.transferErrorMessage: Something went wrong while sending your transfer. Please try again.
global.transferSentMessage: Your transfer has been sent to the Tangle.
global.messageSentMessage: Your message has been sent to the Tangle.
global.keyReuseError: You cannot send to an address that has already been spent from.
global.invalidResponsePollingExplanation: The node returned an invalid response while polling.
global.invalidResponseFetchingAccount: The node returned an invalid response while fetching your account information.
global.invalidResponseSendingTransfer: The node returned an invalid response while sending the transfer.
global.notAvailableExplanation: It will be added at a later stage.
global.unrecognisedPasswordExplanation: كلمة المرور غير مطابقة. يرجى المحاولة مره اخرى.
global.syncInProgressExplanation: Please wait until syncing is complete.
global.cannotPerformActionExplanation: Go to advanced settings to reset the wallet.
global.attachToTangleUnavailableExplanation: Attach to Tangle is not available on your selected node.
global.pressBackAgain: Press back again to close the app

addAdditionalSeed.seedInvalidCharsExplanation: Seeds can only consist of the capital letters A-Z and the number 9. Your seed has invalid characters. Please try again.
addAdditionalSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seeds must be {{maxLength}} characters long. Your seed is currently {{currentLength}} characters long. Please try again.
addAdditionalSeed.nameInUseExplanation: Please use a unique account name for your seed.
addAdditionalSeed.noNicknameExplanation: Please enter an account name for your seed.
addAdditionalSeed.seedInUseExplanation: This seed is already linked to your wallet. Please use a different one.

changePassword.oopsExplanation: Looks like something went wrong while updating your password. Please try again.
changePassword.passwordUpdatedExplanation: Your password has been successfully updated.
changePassword.incorrectPasswordExplanation: Your current password is incorrect. Please try again.
changePassword.passwordsDoNotMatchExplanation: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
changePassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Your password must be at least 8 characters. Please try again.
changePassword.oldPasswordExplanation: You cannot use the old password as your new password. Please try again with a new password.
changePassword.ensureStrongPassword: تأكد من استخدامك كلمة مرور قوية لا تقل عن 12 خانة.

copyToClipboard.seedClearedExplanation: تم مسح القيم من الحافظة لأمنك.
copyToClipboard.seedCopiedExplanation: The seed will be cleared once you press "DONE" or 60 seconds have passed.
copyToClipboard.clickToCopy: Click the button below and copy your seed to a password manager.
copyToClipboard.doNotStore: Do not store your seed in plain text.

enterSeed.invalidCharactersExplanation: Seeds can only consist of the capital letters A-Z and the number 9. Your seed has invalid characters. Please try again.
enterSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seeds must be {{maxLength}} characters long. Your seed is currently {{currentLength}} characters long. Please try again.
enterSeed.seedExplanation: Seeds should be {{maxLength}} characters long, and should contain capital letters A-Z, or the number 9. You cannot use seeds longer than {{maxLength}} characters.
enterSeed.neverShare: لا تقم ابداً بمشاركة السييد الخاص بك مع اي شخص

login.emptyPasswordExplanation: يجب إدخال كلمة مرور لتسجيل الدخول. الرجاء المحاولة مرة أخرى.
login.selectDifferentNode: Do you want to select a different node?

newSeedSetup.seedNotGeneratedExplanation: الرجاء النقر على الزر إنشاء قيم جديدة.
newSeedSetup.individualLetters: اضغط على الأحرف بشكل فردي لكي تكن عشوائية.

onboardingComplete.walletReady: تم إعداد المحفظة الآن وجاهزة للاستخدام. إذا كنت بحاجة إلى إجراء أية تغييرات في المستقبل، فابحث في قائمة الإعدادات.

paperWallet.clickToPrint: اضغط الزر أدناه لطباعة نسخه ورقية من السييد الخاصة بك.
paperWallet.neverShare: لا تقم ابداً بمشاركة السييد الخاص بك مع اي شخص.

saveYourSeed.mustSaveYourSeed: يجب حفظ القيم الخاصة بك مع

seedReentry.incorrectSeedExplanation: The seed you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
seedReentry.thisIsACheck: This is a check to make sure you saved your seed.
seedReentry.ifYouHaveNotSaved: If you have not saved your seed, please go back and do so.

send.invalidAddressExplanation1: Address should be {{maxLength}} characters long and should have a checksum.
send.notEnoughFundsExplanation: You do not have enough IOTA to complete this transfer.
send.keyReuseExplanation: The address you are trying to send to has already been used. Please try another address.
send.invalidAmountExplanation: Please enter a numerical value for the transaction amount.

setPassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Your password must be at least {{minLength}} characters. It is currently {{currentLength}} characters long. Please try again.
setPassword.passwordMismatchExplanation: كلمتي المرور المدخلة لا تتطابق، يرجى المحاولة مرة أخرى.
setPassword.nowWeNeedTo: الآن نحن بحاجة إلى إعداد كلمة مرور.
setPassword.anEncryptedCopy: An encrypted copy of your seed will be stored on your device. You will use this password to access your wallet in future.
setPassword.ensure: تأكد من استخدامك كلمة مرور قوية لا تقل عن 12 خانة.

setSeedName.canUseMultipleSeeds: You can use multiple seeds with this wallet. Each seed requires an account name.
setSeedName.youCanAdd: You can add more seeds in the Settings menu.

settings.accountDeletedExplanation: Your account has been removed from the wallet.

settings.poorConnectionExplanation: Failed to change currency due to a poor connection.
